page.title: 12 GOOD TIMES
page.content: In the playground children shout The noise is very loud Some children play all by themselves And others play in crowds There's running games and jumping too Oh! there are so many There's one called Leapfrog one called Chase, And one called Weeping Jenney There's Rounders played with bat and ball, Where you run from base to base And there's ons called British Bulldog Which we think is really ace These are the games played by The children in our school There's many more but I can't List them all We did a survey of the games Played by the cildren in our class Rounders won by quite a bit And Runacross came last.
